item.title: VFS
item.description: score:71 Chances: VinFast is taking advantage of IRA funding and infrastructure bill opportunities to expand in the US and North America. The company’s participation in CES 2024 indicates its commitment to showcasing new EV concepts and models, signaling potential growth in the electric vehicle market.
